flawed_nl_solution:
There were 30*0.2=<<30*0.2=6>>6 people who didn't show up
So 30-6=<<30-6=20>>20 people showed up
Of the people who showed up, 20*0.75=<<20*0.75=15>>15 got steak
So 20-15=<<20-15=5>>5 got chicken
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
